Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Dimension name (if * then ALL dimensions )

Parameters.Name: pHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Hierarchy name (if * then ALL hierarchies for the specified dimensions)

Parameters.Name: pSub
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Filter on subsets (delimiter separated list of subset names, accepts wildcards)

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter character for subset list (required if pSub parameter is used)

Parameters.Name: pMode
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: <=1 destroy subset, 2 delete all elements
